item.name: Public Lands, Forests, and Mining Subcommittee

item.title: Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act

item.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 122.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Wyden without amendment. With written report No. 113-68.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Wyden without amendment. With written report No. 113-68.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

item.name: Public Lands, Forests, and Mining Subcommittee

item.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 113-28.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

summary.text:
Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act - Amends P.L. 99-548, commonly known as the Mesquite Lands Act of 1986, to require proceeds from sales of parcels of public lands in Mesquite, Nevada, to be used for the implementation of a multispecies habitat conservation plan for the Virgin River in Clark County, Nevada, including any associated groundwater monitoring plan.

Amends the Lincoln County Land Act of 2000 to require implementation of a multispecies habitat conservation plan in Lincoln County, Nevada.

Extends, until November 29, 2021, withdrawal and purchase authority with respect to the fifth and sixth areas.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act - Amends P.L. 99-548, commonly known as the Mesquite Lands Act of 1986, to require proceeds from sales of parcels of public lands in Mesquite, Nevada, to be used for the implementation of a multispecies habitat conservation plan for the Virgin River in Clark County, Nevada, including any associated groundwater monitoring plan.

Amends the Lincoln County Land Act of 2000 to require implementation of a multispecies habitat conservation plan in Lincoln County, Nevada.

Extends, until November 29, 2021, withdrawal and purchase authority with respect to the fifth and sixth areas.

bill.title: Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act

item.title: Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act
Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act

item.titleType: Short Titles as Reported to Senate
item.title: Multispecies Habitat Conservation Plan Implementation Act

A bill to provide for the implementation of the multispecies habitat conservation plan for the Virgin River, Nevada, and Lincoln County, Nevada, to extend the authority to purchase certain parcels of public land, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 122.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
